parquet.hadoop.api

Class ReadSupport<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • parquet.hadoop.api.ReadSupport<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the materialized record
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupReadSupport

    public abstract class ReadSupport<T>
extends Object
    Abstraction used by the ParquetInputFormat to materialize records
    Author:
    Julien Le Dem
